markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible Striker](/Feats.aspx?ID=600) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 189 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Sly Striker](/Feats.aspx?ID=577)

</column>

---

Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation. Nothing can prevent you from making a sneak attack, even if your opponent can see every blow coming. Instead of dealing the damage from Sly Striker, you can deal your full sneak attack damage to a target even if the target isn’t flat-footed.
name: Impossible Striker

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 20" pfs="Standard" > Impossible Striker Source Core Rulebook pg. 189 4.0 Prerequisites Sly Striker --- Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation. Nothing can prevent you from making a sneak attack, even if your opponent can see every blow coming. Instead of dealing the damage from Sly Striker, you can deal your full sneak attack damage to a target even if the target isn’t flat-footed.
